item.title: St. Francis Choir - Oh Happy Day
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 60835

Oh happy day
(oh happy day)
Oh happy day
(oh happy day)
When Jesus washed
(When Jesus washed)
When Jesus washed
(When Jesus washed)
When Jesus washed
(When Jesus washed)
Washed my sins away
(oh happy day)
Oh happy day
(oh happy day)
La la la la
la la la la la
(La la la la
la la la la la)
La la la la la
(La la la la la)
La la la la
la la la
(La la la la
la la la)
La la la la la
(La la la la la)
Oh happy day
(oh happy day)
Oh happy day
(oh happy day)
When Jesus washed
(when Jesus washed)
When Jesus washed
(when Jesus washed)
When my Jesus washed
(when Jesus washed)
Washed my
sins away
La la la la
la la la
(La la la la
la la la)
La la la la la
(La la la la la)
(He taught me how)
Oh he taught me how
(To wash)
to wash to wash
(Fight and pray)
to fight and pray
(Fight and pray)
And he taught me
how to live
rejoicing
(And in rejoicing)
Yes he did oh yeah
(Every) every
every day oh yeah
(Every day)
oh oh
Happy day
(oh happy day)
Oh happy day
(oh happy day)
When Jesus washed
(when Jesus washed)
When my Jesus washed
(when Jesus washed)
When Jesus washed
(when Jesus washed)
My sins away
(oh happy day)
‘Mm talkin’ about
that happy day
(oh happy day)
(He taught me how)
oh yeah how
(To wash) to wash
(Fight and pray)
sing it sing it
come on and
sing it
(Fight and pray)
and to thee yeah yeah
(And in rejoicing)
come on everybody
(Every) sing it
like you mean it
(Everyday)
oh oh oh oh
(Everyday)
oh oh oh
Happy day
(oh happy day)
I’m talkin’ about
that happy day
(oh happy day)
Come on and
talk about happy days
(oh happy day)
Oh oh oh happy day
(oh happy day)
Ooh talkin’ ‘bout a
happy day
(Oh Happy day)
Oh yeah come on
I’m talkin’ ‘bout
happy day
(Oh Happy day)
Oh yeah
sing it sing it
sing it
(oh happy day)
Yeah yeah
oh oh oh
(oh happy day)
